translation2: Today, let's take a look at some "strange hot searches." What is normal public opinion? Let's randomly select three hot searches: "February 2nd Dragon Lifts Its Head," "Good-looking Friends Rise in Price," and "Cargo Transport Incident." Public opinion spreads and forms a peak, and then the index drops (a smooth curve) and eventually dissipates. If there is a secondary public opinion, there will be a small "camel peak" that reappears. They look exactly like the "Evolution Model of Online Public Opinion" displayed on the official website of the Cyberspace Administration of China.  What is abnormal public opinion? Let's randomly select six hot searches from the same event, showing a "lonely peak," a "sawtooth," and a "cliff." A "lonely peak" is artificially heated and quickly rises to the hot search list, attracting widespread attention. A "sawtooth" is periodically heated, ensuring that the topic remains on the hot search list. A "cliff" is a collective withdrawal, and the hot search has fulfilled its "function," waiting for a new task or heading to a new battlefield. In Figure 9, the peak of heat for one event is exactly the valley of another event, with only a few seconds difference, which must be the unified water army receiving a new task and launching a new round of attacks.  The professionalization of black PR is evident: dozens of hot searches are on the list, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for popular science, which ones provoke the situation, which ones divert attention, which ones affect cognition, which ones mislead judgments, which ones incite emotions, and which ones influence decision-making. Black PR accounts are divided into batches and nodes, and the tactics are refined at the node level. They almost consider all the elements of the spread of public opinion.  Spreading is a science, and from the objective data, black PR will disappear without a trace. Leaving traces is inevitable, and we will dig out these traces together. The data source is the "Hot Search Time Machine."

translation2: Taking a foot bath and feeling a tingling sensation in your feet, is it because of electric leakage? Choosing a suitable foot bath basin can have good therapeutic and health effects on your feet. Today, the editor of Jingmei Xiao will answer this question and hope to help friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, foot bath basins have become more and more popular among consumers, and a large number of products with different specifications have emerged in the market, ranging from over a hundred yuan to thousands of yuan, giving consumers a lot of choice. In terms of related data, compared with traditional household appliances, the sales of health-related household appliances such as foot bath basins are booming, but foot bath basins do not have a dedicated industry standard, so there is a certain safety risk. "It's too dangerous to soak your feet in an electrified water!" Mr. Li told reporters. Recently, he bought a foot bath basin as a birthday gift for his father, but his father felt a tingling sensation in his feet when soaking. Mr. Li initially thought it was caused by the vibration function of the foot bath basin, but after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in his feet. Mr. Li tried it with a flashlight and surprisingly found that the water in the foot bath basin was conducting electricity. Later, he contacted the merchant, and the merchant's attitude was not bad, although he returned the foot bath basin, Mr. Li still felt dissatisfied. Because he found that this popular foot bath basin, which has been around for a long time, has no clear and detailed industry regulations in terms of the highest temperature setting, applicable population, and material safety. However, in general, foot bath basins are not prone to electrical problems, but it cannot be ruled out that some products may not have been strictly controlled during manufacturing. Therefore, when purchasing, it is recommended to choose a modular foot bath basin. Separation of water and electricity, no safety hazards. At the same time, you can test it with a flashlight at will.

translation2: Educational News: Beijing Compresses the Proportion of Special Class Students for Junior High School Enrollment in 2016 - Xinhua Net  On the 21st and 22nd of this month, the junior high school entrance examination for special class students in Beijing was organized and implemented by the education committees of all districts. This year, all districts in Beijing have compressed the proportion of special class student enrollment, making the competition even more intense.  For example, in Dongcheng District, the proportion of special class students entering junior high school this year will not exceed 5% of the total enrollment plan of the district, with a planned enrollment of 380 students. The on-campus enrollment ratio will not exceed 10% of the school's enrollment plan. Students with sports, art, and science specialties who have registered online are eligible to participate in the special class student enrollment examination.  To facilitate students to participate in the examination nearby, Dongcheng District continues the examination arrangement from last year. There will be 1 to 2 examination sites set up in each school district, with a total of 13 examination sites. The examination will be divided into districts and classrooms, and students will take the examination in different districts and classrooms on the same day.  On May 23rd, the list of students who have passed the district education enrollment examination will be announced online. Students can check their examination results online.

translation2: The Yangtze River upstream has achieved full coverage of water-based green comprehensive service areas - Xinhua News Agency Xinhua News Agency Wuhan, December 11 (Reporter Wang Hui) The water-based green comprehensive service area in Shenzhen, Chongqing was officially put into operation on the 10th, which is the second water-based green comprehensive service area in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River to officially operate after the water-based green comprehensive service area in Luzhou, Sichuan was officially put into operation on the 8th. With this, the water-based green comprehensive service areas have covered the upper, middle, and lower reaches of the Yangtze River.  The Transportation and Communications Bureau of the Ministry of Transport introduced that before this, provinces such as Hubei, Hunan, Jiangxi, Anhui, and Jiangsu had built and put into operation 10 water-based green comprehensive service areas in the middle and lower reaches of the Yangtze River, which had been widely recognized by sailors and played an important role in promoting the high-quality development of Yangtze River shipping. The full coverage of water-based green comprehensive service areas is another milestone event in the construction of green shipping on the Yangtze River, and the reception of ship pollutants and the service capacity of shipping have been significantly improved.  It is introduced that the water-based green comprehensive service area is an important facility for providing all-round production and living services for sailors and ships. The two water-based green comprehensive service areas in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River that were officially put into operation this time integrate life services, production services, and government services, with green environmental protection as the main theme and ship repair and emergency rescue services as the characteristic, realizing the "one-stop docking, multiple services" for ships in the port, which will make the sailors who have been sailing on the Yangtze River for many years work more efficiently and conveniently.

translation2: What is the way to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label whisky? Everyone has different hobbies, some like to collect, some like to enjoy food, of course, there are also those who like to appreciate wine. Johnnie Walker Red Label is currently one of the best-selling Scottish whiskies in various countries, and it has also won a gold medal at the International Wine and Spirits Competition. Each bottle of Johnnie Walker Red Label has a unique taste, but if you don't know how to appreciate it, won't you waste its aroma? So, how do you drink Johnnie Walker Red Label? The editor will briefly introduce it for everyone.  The way to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label: Johnnie Walker Red Label is made by blending about 35 Scottish whiskies, with a strong and traditional flavor of Scottish whisky, and a fragrant aroma with a hint of sweetness and smokiness. When you taste it, it is rich and refreshing, with a hint of vanilla and a strong smoky malt flavor. This whisky can be drunk directly over ice or mixed with your favorite drink.  Since Johnnie Walker Red Label entered China, it has been blended with soda, beer, or other carbonated drinks to become a timeless fashion trend. These sweet drinks not only neutralize the acidity, but they also bring visual pleasure, and when added to the drink, they have the effect of changing the taste of the whisky. The most authentic and traditional way to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label is to add a slice of lemon and sugar (sand can also be used). The traditional taste of Johnnie Walker Red Label is slightly sour, and adding sugar can neutralize its acidity, while the lemon will bring a refreshing fragrance to the whisky, of course, the sweet and sour taste can be adjusted according to personal taste preferences.  The above three ways are the best ways to drink Johnnie Walker Red Label. Everyone can use them as a reference and try them out. Hopefully, the editor's introduction can help everyone.

translation2: Chinese to English Translation:  Curators from China and Saudi Arabia join forces to hold the first Saudi Contemporary Art Biennale in Diriyah - Xinhua Net, Xinhua News Agency, Riyadh, December 12 (Reporters: Wang Hai Zhou, Hu Jun) The Diriyah Contemporary Art Biennale in Saudi Arabia, the first of its kind, was officially opened to the public on the 11th in Diriyah JAX Art District in the northwest of the capital Riyadh. A total of 64 artists from Saudi Arabia and China participated in the biennale. The biennale was co-curated by the Diriyah Biennale Foundation in Saudi Arabia and the UCCA Center for Contemporary Art in China, with the director of the UCCA Center, Fei Yu, serving as the artistic director. According to the curatorial team, the theme of the biennale is "Touching Stones to Cross the River", which metaphorically represents the reform strategies adopted during the social and economic transformation period and reflects the current state of Saudi society and culture. The biennale covers an area of nearly 12,000 square meters, with six interconnected buildings presenting works in six units: "Touching Stones to Cross the River", "Inheritance as Experiment", "Edge Thinking", "Towards the Public", "Beautiful New World", and "On the Spirit of Art". Among them, the works of 27 Saudi artists account for more than 40% of the total number of works, covering various forms such as painting, installation art, and performance art. The works of 12 Chinese artists have also attracted attention, with some artists using innovative ways to create works using recycled materials, such as Ice using discarded materials to reconstruct a classic landscape painting in his "Behind the Story Series: Endless Mountains and Rivers" (2014). The CEO of the Diriyah Biennale Foundation, Bakri, hopes that this biennale can establish an international dialogue and give global audiences the opportunity to understand the cultural and creative industry and the creative community in Saudi Arabia, and to enhance interaction. Fei Yu said, "The goal of the biennale is double, allowing Saudi contemporary art to participate in the global dialogue, and allowing Saudi audiences to immerse themselves in the world of contemporary art." It is understood that a series of lectures will be held during the opening period of the biennale, and artists, curators, and leaders in the creative industry will discuss topics such as cross-cultural exchange and the development of contemporary art.

translation2: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a factory in Yuejing Town, Yongjia County, Zhejiang through a real estate agent. After several on-site visits, Mr. Lu decided to purchase the factory. In December of the same year, Mr. Lu and the owner of the property, Mr. Lin, negotiated the details of the purchase and sale and Mr. Lu transferred 200,000 yuan to Mr. Lin's account as a deposit. Mr. Lin signed the "Factory Purchase and Sale Deposit Receipt" as the recipient and stipulated that if the buyer did not want to buy the factory, the deposit would be returned to the seller. If the seller did not want to sell the factory, the deposit would be doubled and returned to the seller. Both parties agreed to sign the factory purchase and sale contract within a week. However, due to disagreements on the main terms of the contract, such as the scope of sale and payment methods, the contract was not signed. Considering that both parties failed to reach an agreement on the contents of the contract, Mr. Lin refunded the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Lu a few days later. The factory that Mr. Lu had carefully chosen, the deposit had been paid, and the house money was ready, but the seller did not sign the contract, which made Mr. Lu helpless and angry. Therefore, Mr. Lu filed a lawsuit against Mr. Lin at the Yongjia County People's Court. The court held that since both parties failed to sign a formal contract in the end, it cannot be solely attributed to the defendant, and it should be reasonably inferred that the negotiation failed. Therefore, this case should not apply the penalty for breach of contract, and the defendant does not need to bear the liability of double compensation for breach of contract. After the first instance judgment, the plaintiff appealed. Recently, the second instance court upheld the original judgment.  [Lawyer's Reminder]: It is the duty to exercise necessary caution in the transaction process. When signing a contract, as the buyer, you should also exercise necessary caution, such as verifying the information of the property owner and whether the property is occupied by someone else, and clearly stipulating the specific time and location of delivery in the contract to avoid disputes when performing the contract.

The makeup artist occasionally reminded us to pay attention to our clothing and accessories, and would immediately help us fix anything that wasn't quite right. The photographer was also very humorous and made us feel happy all day during the photoshoot. When it came to selecting the photos, we saw many examples online and didn't want to delete too many photos for the customers, but when we were selecting the photos, we didn't feel the need to add any, we just chose the 24 included in the package, and none of them were added (I heard that my sister who took her wedding dress photos with the same photographer spent over 7,000 yuan for a package that included over 1,000 photos, at the time I was shocked and afraid that I would choose too many). Today, the photos have been edited and Lanlan sent them to me, I saw two that I thought weren't very good, and they immediately helped me re-edit them. When I compared the photos my sister took before with ours, I was really satisfied with our photos, simple and fresh, just the style I wanted. translation2: 大美360集成家装地址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼  Initially, I was introduced by a friend because I trusted them, so I came to take a look. My initial budget was 70,000 yuan for basic renovation. When I arrived at the store, they started a series of tricks. I was the first time coming to the store, and I only gave them my floor plan. They did not go to the site to measure the house, but they could give me a quote saying that my 135-square-meter house could be done for 70,000 yuan. They roughly gave me a look at their materials, but I didn't know what brand they were. Their second trick was that you would have to pay the deposit as soon as you came to the store (and once you paid, you would never be able to get it back unless you had enough experience and could argue with them). When I was hesitant about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell you that if you paid the deposit today, they would give you a certain amount of discount. This was a big trap, and I was cheated alive. At the time, I was impulsive and paid more than 10,000 yuan in deposit. The quotation they gave me had many problems. It didn't include water and electricity renovation, or any doors and cabinets, or the bathroom, which were all basic fees. In addition, their service charges were higher than those of other companies. I lost trust in this company. From the beginning, they didn't explain anything clearly and made me sign the contract. When I went to ask for a refund, they showed great experience and had a special team to deal with customers. They would shift the blame and avoid responsibility in various ways. They also had many details that I didn't want to go into. In short, don't choose this kind of company. My friend's house, which was decorated by them, was also of poor quality, and they charged various fees later. They are the original masters of cheating people, now changed to Big Mei, and seem to have gone bankrupt and changed to other names. So, don't choose this kind of decoration company. In the future, when choosing, please check on Baidu and consult these things because decoration is not cheap. If you want to ask a business, please log in or register. It is strictly forbidden to post various forms of comments on businesses. For detailed information, please see the merchant's declaration. The mass commenting channel provides you with the latest merchant information such as the address, phone number, and business hours of Big Mei 360 Integrated Home Decoration. If you want to find a decoration company, just go to the mass commenting channel.

translation2: The 13th Provincial Tea Expo Opens - Headlines - Hunan Daily Online - China News Service 12/10/2022 (Full Media Reporters: Zhang Shangwu, Hu Lanlan, Correspondent: Liu Xiaoling, Photographer: Li Jian) On the morning of December 10th, the 13th Hunan Tea Industry Expo and New Tea Red Tea Promotion Conference was held at the Hunan International Convention and Exhibition Center, showcasing the tea industry, innovating tea technology, promoting tea culture, and accelerating the goal of a trillion-dollar tea industry. Vice Chairman of the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives and Vice Chairman of the Hunan Provincial People's Congress, Ye Hongzhen, attended the opening ceremony. At the opening ceremony, Professor Liu Zhonghua, a member of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, solemnly introduced: "The source of red tea is in Xinhua, and the rise of red tea injects new impetus into 'Five-color Tea in Hunan'." In recent years, the Provincial Committee and the Provincial Government have strongly supported the development of the tea industry and promoted the construction of a trillion-dollar Hunan tea industry, forming a development pattern of "Three Hunan, Four Waters, Five-color Tea". The tea industry in the province has increased its innovation, with main tea varieties such as green tea, black tea, and red tea taking turns to launch, and the main tea-producing areas promoting tea tourism integration, driving a significant increase in income for tea farmers and the overall increase in tea garden value. At the opening ceremony, the provincial leaders awarded the fourth batch of enterprises authorized to use the "Hunan Red Tea" trademark, and Xinhua warmly welcomed the "Red Tea Source". At the Xinhua Red Tea Exhibition Hall, a Fujian tea merchant was attracted by a high mountain tea named "Ice in Spring", and placed an order on the spot. Secretary-General of the Hunan Tea Industry Association, Wang Jun, said with joy that various factors such as the epidemic have had an impact on the tea leaf market, but from the scene of the Tea Expo, the highlights are evident. The red tea of Xinhua adds a touch of color to tea culture, with popularity and lively transactions, and the Hunan tea industry ushers in a new spring.

translation2: Jiangxi will train 10,000 music, art, and physical education teachers in rural primary schools in the next three years - Xinhua News Agency Xinhua News Agency, Nanchang, May 22 (Reporter Chen Yuxuan) According to a recent report from the Jiangxi Provincial Department of Education, in order to strengthen the shortage of subject teachers and achieve balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, since 2016, Jiangxi Province has planned to train 10,000 music, art, and physical education teachers for primary schools in the entire province within three years. It is understood that the training objects are teachers in rural primary schools in Jiangxi who are under 45 years old and have a basic knowledge or talent in music, art, and physical education, and can also serve as teachers of other subjects. Through training, they will master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of music, art, and physical education, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve their subject teaching and activity design capabilities, school campus cultural capabilities, and self-development capabilities, and build a team of multi-talented music, art, and physical education teachers. To ensure the quality and effectiveness of the training, Jiangxi also plans to train 300 teachers in music, art, and physical education in 100 counties (cities, districts) of the province, with a total of 1,000 trainees. It will comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leadership ability, teaching research activity design organization ability, training ability, and network research workshop construction ability, and play a teaching, demonstrating, guiding, and supervising role.

translation2: According to a report from Xinhua News Agency, the number of college graduates in Beijing is expected to reach 268,000 in 2022, an increase of 16,000 from last year. The Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said it will deploy measures to match supply and demand, strengthen policy support, broaden employment channels, ensure assistance for those in difficulty, support innovation and entrepreneurship, and improve service efficiency. The bureau will establish a practical platform and increase job opportunities by actively contacting 40 universities' career experience bases, visiting employers, and integrating demand and job information. It will also focus on the "Six Ones" plan, which includes expanding recruitment for state-owned enterprises, expanding recruitment for grassroots projects, expanding recruitment for military service, expanding internship and employment retention, expanding entrepreneurship-driven employment, and expanding employment opportunities. The bureau will also implement "One Plan for a Lifetime" dynamic management, recommending no fewer than 5 job information for each graduate and ensuring that graduates with employment difficulties have 100% assistance.

translation2: The State Council's joint prevention and control mechanism has issued a document requiring strengthening the epidemic prevention and control work in port cities to prevent and control the new crown pneumonia epidemic. It stipulates that persons who have recently left land ports of entry (excluding those connected to Hong Kong and Macao) must hold a negative nucleic acid test certificate within 48 hours, and persons entering land ports of entry must undergo at least one nucleic acid test after arrival. The time range for this requirement is from the announcement of the port city scope by each province (autonomous region, municipality directly under the central government) to March 15, 2022. In addition, the document proposes that conditionally, port cities may study the establishment of an epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction.  A relevant responsible person of the National Health Commission introduced that for some port cities, cross-border trade is a mainstay of the local economy, and there is frequent travel between the two sides of the border. By implementing differentiated management policies and turning a single line of epidemic prevention and control into two lines, it is hoped to achieve the maximum effect of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and cost.  Recently, there have been multiple domestic cluster outbreaks in China, all of which were imported through port cities. The above-mentioned document points out that this exposes some problems, such as the lack of timely epidemic monitoring and early warning, the non-implementation of closed-loop management for high-risk personnel, the formality of regular nucleic acid testing, the incomplete disinfection of cold-chain items at all links, the irregular management of centralized isolation sites, and the unscientific and insufficient emergency response to epidemic prevention and control.  The document requires strengthening the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system, implementing border control measures, and other nine aspects to fill the gaps in port city epidemic prevention and control. It emphasizes that port cities should coordinate epidemic prevention and control with the protection of people's livelihood, publicize and deploy epidemic prevention and control measures in a timely manner, and proactively respond to and solve prominent problems reflected by the public. According to the document, the port cities mentioned include those with open land, water, and air ports, including the counties (cities, districts, banners) where they are located, the cities (prefectures, states, leagues) where they are located, and the directly-administered municipalities where they are located. The specific scope will be determined by each province (autonomous region, directly-administered municipality) according to epidemic prevention and control needs and announced in a timely manner.

translation2: How to Pay Driver Service Fee?  如果您想向骑手支付服务费，请按照以下步骤操作：  1. 打开您的手机应用商店，搜索并下载相应的支付应用（如支付宝、微信支付等）。 2. 在支付应用中，选择“扫一扫”或“扫码支付”功能。 3. 将骑手提供的支付二维码扫描到您的手机屏幕上。 4. 确认支付金额和信息无误后，点击“支付”按钮。 5. 完成支付后，您将收到一个支付成功的提示，并且骑手也会收到您的支付信息。  请注意，为了确保您的支付信息安全，请确保您的手机和支付应用都是最新版本，并使用安全的网络连接进行支付操作。如果您遇到任何支付问题，请及时联系支付应用的客服团队寻求帮助。

translation2: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。

translation2: The joint disaster relief exercise "Peace Rescue-2021" between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies ended successfully-Xinhua Net-Xinhua News Agency, Hanoi, December 12 (Shu Na, Teng Hui Jin)  Hanoi, December 12 (Xinhua) -- The Chinese team participating in the joint disaster relief exercise "Peace Rescue-2021" between the Chinese and Vietnamese armies returned safely to Guangxi, China on the morning of the 12th, marking the successful completion of the 7-day exercise mission. This exercise focused on the major topic of humanitarian medical rescue, closely following the mission of saving lives and relieving injuries, and completed joint logistics command, joint on-site rescue, and large-scale patient treatment under real combat conditions, effectively enhancing the logistics support capabilities of the two armies. The exercise results were recognized by both sides.  Vuong Xuan, head of the Vietnamese exercise guidance committee and deputy chief of staff of the Vietnamese People's Army Logistics Department, said at the closing ceremony that through this exercise, the Vietnamese military learned about the organization and professional activities of the exercise from the Chinese military medical team, as well as the medical and support equipment of the Chinese side. The results of the exercise prove that the military medical forces of the two countries have professional capabilities in medical assistance and epidemic prevention.  Chen Chunming, head of the Chinese side's guidance and coordination group and deputy director of the Logistics Support Department of the Central Military Commission, said that this exercise was another innovative practice built on the successful holding of joint medical examinations in 2018, and had great significance as a milestone. During the exercise, the Chinese People's Liberation Army donated medical protective masks, medical protective clothing, and rapid nucleic acid testing instruments to the Vietnamese People's Army.
